text: He didn't know what to make of it, but it was Mr. Copthorne all right. Perhaps he had been attending some kind of fancy dress do in London. Very strange his eyes looked. Mad, hunted eyes, as if the poor fellow had rocks in his head, so the verger described afterwards. "You're very early about, sir," he said, trying to speak normally.
